attributes.action: Scrap the BT sport and Sky sports box office football viewing
attributes.additional_details: End the illegal streaming of premier league football games and make games free to watch
attributes.background: Take football viewing rights into the public’s right stop the tv company’s pricing football fans out of watching football

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for broadcasters and the football authorities.
